title: Interpersonal Goals Exercises
introText: Before any interpersonal interaction, it's important to clarify what you want to achieve. These exercises help you identify your objectives, relationship, and self-respect goals, then plan how to communicate effectively while staying true to your values.

exercises.title: Clarify Your Goals
exercises.description: Identify your objectives, relationship, and self-respect goals, then rank them by importance for your current situation.

exercises.title: Plan Your Response
exercises.description: Reflect on whether your goals align with your values, then plan your words, tone, and desired outcome.

exercises.title: Balance Your Goals
exercises.description: Remember that interpersonal effectiveness is about balancing three goals: getting what you want (objectives), maintaining the relationship, and keeping your self-respect. Sometimes you'll prioritize one over the others, and that's okayâ€”the key is making that choice consciously.
